snippet.title: Every Day is Indie Game Dev Day - The Making of Mekorama and Fancade
snippet.description:
SUBSCRIBE for the game documentary podcast There is a Glitch in Everything ► https://thereisaglitchineverything.podbean.com 
If you know Swedish check out the Swedish podcast Spelskaparna ►http://spelskaparna.com/

Martin moved into the Swedish woods to focus on developing his own games in 2013. Since then he has created the mobile game Mekorama and he is now getting closer to the release of his new title Fancade. In this documentary, we will get an insider look on how Martin creates his games.

Fancade ► http://www.martinmagni.com/
Instagram ► https://www.instagram.com/spelskaparna/

Filmed & Edited by Olle Landin
info@spelskaparna.com
